Text: dbags at EA need to make another madden for PC. we havent got one since 2008

you're not missing anything nignug. It's pretty much been the same game for the last 5 years anyway.

The only thing that's changed is the rosters basically.

Madden 2003 and 2004 were the best of the series, right before the "next generation" consoles came out. Once Madden hit 2006 on the 360, it was all over. Garbage products, no heart and soul. 

This madden was kickass, so was 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004.
